title: ESPN's Front Office Insider Bobby Marks
description:
ESPN's front-office insider Bobby Marks joins The Woj Pod to discuss the fallout of the Bulls-Heat free agency probe, the dawning of NBA trade season, the looming collective bargaining talks and much, much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
